articles.description: Petrol and diesel prices have reached their record level across the country. Petrol has crossed Rs 84 per litre for the first time in Delhi.

articles.title: 2021 MG Hector facelift launched, starts at Rs 12.89 lakh - Times of India
articles.description: Cars News: ​The 5-seater Hector is priced between Rs 12.89 lakh and Rs 18.32 lakh (ex-showroom, Delhi). The 6-seater Hector Plus is priced between Rs 15.99 lakh
